div.t-if: o.invoice_date or (o.invoice_date_due and o.move_type == 'out_invoice' and o.state == 'posted') or o.delivery_date or o.invoice_origin or o.partner_id.ref or o.ref or o.invoice_incoterm_id

t.t-value: any(line.name and line.name.count('\n') > 30 for line in o.invoice_line_ids if line.name)

th.name: th_priceunit
th.t-attf-class: text-end text-nowrap {{ 'd-none d-md-table-cell' if report_type == 'html' else '' }}

t.t-value: 3 if current_subsection else (2 if current_section else 0)

tr.t-att-class: 'fw-bolder o_line_section' if is_section else 'fw-bold o_line_subsection' if is_subsection else 'fst-italic o_line_note' if is_note else ''

t.t-value: ', '.join(tax.tax_label for tax in line.tax_ids if tax.tax_label)

td.name: td_taxes
td.t-attf-class: text-end {{ 'd-none d-md-table-cell' if report_type == 'html' else '' }} {{ 'text-nowrap' if len(taxes) < 10 else '' }}

td.name: line_name_td
td.t-att-colspan: (1 if is_product else 6 if display_discount else 5) - line_colspan

td.span: A note, whose content usually applies to the section or product above.

t.t-value: 3 + (1 if display_discount else 0) + (1 if display_taxes and not grouped_line.get('taxes') else 0)

3 if current_subsection and grouped_line['display_type'] != 'line_subsection' and grouped_line.get('original_display_type') != 'line_subsection' else 2 if current_section and grouped_line['display_type'] != 'line_section' and grouped_line.get('original_display_type') != 'line_section' else 0

tr.t-att-class: 'fw-bolder o_line_section' if grouped_line.get('display_type') == 'line_section' and not hide_details else 'fw-bold o_line_subsection' if grouped_line.get('display_type') == 'line_subsection' and not hide_details else ''

td.name: td_quantity_grouped
td.t-if: hide_details or (hide_prices and grouped_line['display_type'] not in ('line_section', 'line_subsection'))

td.name: td_taxes_grouped
td.t-if: (display_taxes and grouped_line['display_type'] in ('line_section', 'line_subsection') and grouped_line.get('taxes')) or grouped_line['display_type'] == 'product'
